title: Mogging Emoji Combos & How to Add Them to Your Keyboard

steps.title: 🧏🤫/🧏‍♀️🤫: Shh, I’m Mogging
steps.content: 🧏🤫/🧏‍♀️🤫: Shh, I’m Mogging Using the jawline and “shh” emoji combo is a great way to express that you’re mogging . Although the 🧏 emoji is officially used to represent deaf people and those who are hard of hearing, it has been adopted to refer to a strong jawline, which is a key feature of mogging. Use this emoji combo when you want to show that you’re mogging. For example: [1] X Research source Your Friend: “Bro, you’re so goofy 😭 You fr looksmaxxing? You’re gonna be mogging everybody in the halls 💀💀” You: “Yessir 🧏🤫” This emoji combination is also used to represent mewing.

steps.title: 🤫🧏👋: Bye Bye
steps.content: 🤫🧏👋: Bye Bye The hand wave in this emoji combination is a reference to Lumi Athena’s track “ICEWHORE!” , which is commonly used in Reels and TikTok videos about mogging, mewing , and looksmaxxing . In these videos, the creators put their fingers to their lips to make a “Shh” face before rubbing their index finger up and down their jawline to mog the viewers. For example: [2] X Research source Your Friend: “I saw that TikTok video where you were scrunching your face. What were you doing bro 💔” You: “Chill bro 🤫🧏👋”

steps.title: 🧏🧏: Peep the Jawline
steps.content: 🧏🧏: Peep the Jawline Flexing your jawline is a signature way to mog others. Using the double jawline emojis in a text chain is a great way to express your attractiveness and self-confidence. For example: Your Friend “Brooo, I just peeped your new pic on IG. So tuff bro. How’d you get so many likes?” You: “Appreciate it heavy. Can’t even spill the sauce bro but you already know 🧏🧏”

steps.title: 🤫🧏🗿: Mogging & Mewing
steps.content: 🤫🧏🗿: Mogging & Mewing The addition of the moai emoji (🗿) to the 🤫🧏 combination adds a layer of confidence to your mogging message, as the 🗿 is meant to imply strength and determination (and a flawless face in the context of mogging) When you’re really feeling confident in yourself, add the 🗿 emoji. For example: [3] X Research source Your Friend: “Yooo I heard you got a haircut this weekend. How’d it turn out?” You: “So hard bro my barber locked in 🤫🧏🗿”

steps.title: 🤨😗: Get Mogged
steps.content: 🤨😗: Get Mogged This combo is a simple way to subtly mog. Since 🤨 is an emoji that expresses confusion, it might raise a few eyebrows, but the addition of 😗 is a reminder that you’re mogging, as puckering the lips together is a staple in mogging videos and exercises. Use this as a surprising way to mog your friends over text. Your Friend: “I’ve been seeing all these looksmaxxing videos dude they’re so nuts. I didn’t even know that was a thing.” You: 🤨😗 get mogged 😂😂😂”

steps.title: Find an image of the custom mog emoji and add it to your keyboard.
steps.content: Find an image of the custom mog emoji and add it to your keyboard. Download an image of the custom mog emoji to your camera roll from apps like Pinterest, TikTok, or Instagram. Open your keyboard, click the emoji icon, and swipe left to the Stickers section. Click Open Stickers, click the sticker icon next to the clock, and select New Sticker. Once your camera roll opens, select the image you’d like to use, hold your finger down on the emoji, and click Add Sticker. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Mog emojis represent mogging, or outclassing another person.
steps.content: Mog emojis represent mogging, or outclassing another person. Mog stands for “alpha male of the group.” [5] X Research source Mog emoji combinations are most often used to represent mogging, or outclassing, another person in a particular thing. Mogging is mainly used to refer to someone’s superior attractiveness, whether it be their physical attractiveness, how well their outfit is put together, or how they carry themselves. It can be used to refer to the attractiveness of you or someone else. For example: [6] X Research source Your Friend: “Bro, the way you put that fit together is so tuff 🗿” You: Appreciate it, bro. Had to get a calm fit off today. I’m tryna impress the huzz 🤫🧏”

steps.title: Compliment the other person to make them feel attractive.
steps.content: Compliment the other person to make them feel attractive. When someone sends you a mog emoji combination, reply with a compliment or emoji combination that hypes them up and makes them feel attractive. Expressing how you feel about your appearance can be tough, and receiving a compliment can really affirm those feelings of attractiveness and make you feel good. For example: Your Friend: “Just got some new shoes, a fresh cut, and some new clothes. I’m feeling like himothy bro 🤫🧏” You: “Good stuff bro 💪 I bet your drip is next level. Your barber probably beamed you up, too. Not even tryna glaze.”

steps.title: Rizz Emojis
steps.content: Rizz Emojis Rizz is short for charisma and refers to your ability to charm someone in a romantic sense. Using rizz emojis is a great way to flirt over text and jokingly express your attraction to another person. Plus there are plenty of rizz emoji combinations to choose from, like “😏👀” and “😏😎.” They can be used ironically with friends or seriously when flirting with someone you like. Some rizz emoji combinations include: 🔥😈 🗣️💕 😘😜 😋😉 😉😘

steps.title: Mewing Emojis
steps.content: Mewing Emojis Similar to mog emojis, mewing emojis are used to symbolize mewing and looksmaxxing. Mewing and looksmaxxing are when you intentionally push your tongue to the roof of your mouth to accentuate your jawline and maximize your looks. Like mog emojis, mewing emoji combinations like “🧏🧏” and “🤫🧏‍♂️” are often used to draw attention to your physical appearance and express how attractive you are. Other combinations include: 🤫🧏‍♂️🗿 🧏👄 🗿🗿 🧏‍♂️🗿 🧏💪

steps.title: Sus Emojis
steps.content: Sus Emojis Sus emojis are most commonly used to convey that something is suspicious, sketchy, or abnormal. Sus emojis and emoji combinations are useful to express your suspicions about what someone is saying or doing. For example, the 🧐 emoji is perfect for when something is too good to be true or needs to be investigated. Other sus emojis and combinations include: 🤨 🤔🤔 🤔🤫 😳🥴 🤔😵‍💫
